title: Find Your Perfect Streaming Service
description: Let us help you choose the right streaming service for your viewing preferences

questions.question: What type of content do you enjoy most?

options.text: Dramas & Serious Shows
Comedies & Light Entertainment
Action, Thrillers & Crime Shows
Family & Kids Programming
Sci-Fi, Fantasy & Supernatural
Reality TV & Documentaries

questions.question: Which of these shows or types of content interests you most?

options.text: Netflix Originals: Stranger Things, Wednesday, Squid Game
HBO Prestige Dramas: House of the Dragon, The Last of Us, Succession
Disney, Marvel, & Star Wars: The Mandalorian, Loki, Disney Classics
Amazon Prime Exclusives: The Boys, Jack Ryan, Lord of the Rings
Apple TV+ Originals: Ted Lasso, Severance, The Morning Show

questions.question: Are you interested in live sports or news?

options.text: Yes, live sports are important to me

options.text: I hate ads - I want commercial-free viewing

options.text: Under $10/month

options.text: Just one - keep it simple

Netflix.title: Netflix
reasons: Netflix has the largest variety of content and the most original shows
Award-winning originals like Stranger Things, Wednesday, and Squid Game
Simple, easy-to-use app that works on almost any device

products.name: Netflix (With Ads)
specs: Thousands of movies and TV shows
Netflix Originals: Stranger Things, Wednesday, Squid Game
Watch on any device in HD
Best value for accessing the full library
products.why: The most affordable way to access the world's most popular streaming service. You get the same great shows as the higher plans, just with a few short commercials.

products.name: Netflix Standard (No Ads)
specs: Can download shows to watch offline
products.why: Perfect if you hate commercials and want to download shows for when you're traveling or without internet.

HBO Max.title: HBO Max (Max)
reasons: The gold standard for high-quality prestige dramas
Home to House of the Dragon, The Last of Us, and Succession
Includes Warner Bros movies and DC superhero content

products.name: Max (With Ads)
specs: All Max content including HBO originals
products.why: The most affordable way to watch award-winning HBO shows. Excellent value if you're looking for high-quality storytelling.

products.name: Max (No Ads)
specs: Download up to 30 shows to watch offline
products.why: For the best viewing experience without any interruptions. Perfect for serious TV fans.

Disney+.title: Disney+
reasons: Unbeatable selection for families and kids
Home to Marvel, Star Wars, Pixar, and Disney classics

products.name: Disney+ (With Ads)
features: All Disney, Marvel, Star Wars content
products.why: A great value for families who want access to all their favorite movie franchises without paying a lot.

products.name: Disney Bundle (Disney, Hulu, ESPN+)
features: Three services for one low price
Hulu adds a huge library of TV shows
products.why: The ultimate bundle. It covers families, sports fans, and people who want the latest TV shows all in one package.

Amazon Prime Video.title: Amazon Prime Video
reasons: Often already included if you have Amazon Prime shipping
Great original shows like The Boys and Jack Ryan
Ability to rent or buy movies directly in the app

products.name: Amazon Prime (includes Video)
features: Huge library of movies and TV shows
Prime Music and Prime Reading included
Originals: Lord of the Rings, Reacher
X-Ray feature gives info about actors in scenes
products.why: If you already shop on Amazon, you probably already have this! It's one of the best values because of the combined shipping and video benefits.

Apple TV+.title: Apple TV+
reasons: Award-winning originals with very high production quality
Ted Lasso, Severance, and The Morning Show
No ads on any of their shows

products.name: Apple TV+
features: Only original content - no library of old shows
Share with up to 5 family members
Best looking shows on any service
products.why: Apple focuses on quality over quantity. Every show they make is high-budget and usually excellent. Perfect if you want something new and impressive to watch.
